edited_stories.edited_story_text: We took a trip to the local zoo to see lots of animals. We saw lots of cool animals, including a flamingo. The giraffe had a strange expression on his face. The meerkat came out of hiding and I took a photo. My favorite was the warthog, which had big tusks.
